page.title: 16Social Concerns_Elderly
page.content: {Grouped Dwellings.}The Elderly peoples home has 44 rooms excluding the toilets,Wardens Office and the laundry.Also there are rest rooms with high backed chairs and a piano in them.the elderly go on trips to Wykeham for picnics.They must provide their own food for the picnic. {Social Life.}The elderly have clubs like Darby and Joan,Bingo and the photographic society.Each person has a room to themselves and the capable people havethe top floor while the less capable have the bottom floor. {Warden.}Mrs.Flint the chief Warden looks after the elderly but on her day off a relief warden takes her place. Every morning the elderly have a morning call to see that they are alright.The call is made on a inticom. There is a cord to cotact the warden if the elderly feel suddenly ill.
